b'A genuine, heartfelt thank you to anyone that ever listened to my music and stuck around. \n\nHappy 20th Anniversary \xe2\x80\x98Let Go\xe2\x80\x99 and here\xe2\x80\x99s to another 20 years \xf0\x9f\x96\xa4 The 20th Anniversary edition is available now wherever you buy or stream music. (6/6)'

b'I say every night on stage how lucky I feel to be making music, touring and having as much fun as I do. I share this moment with all of you, because without you guys, these songs wouldn\xe2\x80\x99t have reached the heights that they did. (5/6)'

b'Also a massive thank you to everyone who played a role, big or small, in helping make this record the success that it was. Last but certainly not least, thank YOU, to every single one of you who made a connection with this album and stayed with me since. (4/6)'

b'None of this would have been possible without the help and guidance of LA Reid, Lauren Christy, The Matrix, Cliff Magness, Curt Frasca, and Sabelle Beer. I will always be grateful to you guys for letting me be myself. (3/6)'

b'It\xe2\x80\x99s hard to try and comprehend how, 20 years later, the songs I wrote as a 17 year old would still resonate w/ people today. It\xe2\x80\x99s pretty crazy. It put me on a path & took me places I never in my wildest dreams could have ever expected & I\xe2\x80\x99m thankful for it every single day (2/6)'

b'Today marks 20 years since I released my album \xe2\x80\x98Let Go\xe2\x80\x99. I will never be able to fully explain not only how much this album meant to me, but the monumental impact it has had on my life (1/6) https://t.co/YIybpNTLRa'
